main event: Several motorists and a farmer in Levelland, Texas, reported seeing a large glowing object that caused their vehicles to stall on the night of November 2, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed to hover at a height of 20-50 feet and was approximately 200-300 feet in diameter,The object was described as glowing orange or reddish-orange,Multiple witnesses experienced their vehicle motors and lights going out in the presence of the object,The Air Force deemed the event significant due to multiple, independent witnesses corroborating the same phenomena,The investigation concluded the object remained unidentified with potential explanations being meteors or balloons.
